Alumon
Nickname The Devil Hunter
Passive Skills While casting, reduces damage taken by 20%.
Dungeon Skills
Life Drain Shoots a slow moving projectile that will pass through enemies, damaging them and Healing the party.
Path of Darkness Leaves a trail of darkness behind Alumon as he walks, increasing Alumon's movement speed. Damages and slows down any enemies that walk into it.
Combat Abilities
Burst Blood Frenzy, Reaper, Doom

Calibretto
Nickname The War Golem
Passive Skills +10% Healing Power.
Dungeon Skills
Revitalize Restores party health by a moderate amount.
Cannon Shot Fires a projectile that will damage enemies and put an Ignite debuff on them for the next battle.

Garrison
Nickname The Arena Master
Passive Skills Builds Overcharge faster and has a larger Overcharge pool.
Dungeon Skills
Quickstep A dash that avoids trap damage and adds a massive Haste buff to Garrison if he initiates combat with it.
Flashblind Throws a flash bomb, blinding any creature struck. Affected enemies enter combat Stunned.
Combat Abilities
Burst Heart Bleed, Relentless Assault, Blademaster
Character Trailer

Gully
Nickname The Young Defender
Passive Skills +10% to All damage reduction.
Dungeon Skills
Ground Smash Briefly Stun all nearby enemies. Stun carries over into combat. Also breaks weak walls.
Stoneskin Become immune to dungeon damage and increase defense when entering combat while it lasts.
Combat Abilities
Burst Shielded Assault, Boulder Toss, Might of Aramus

Knolan
Nickname The Wise Mage
Passive Skills Has an extra large mana pool, but builds Overcharge slower.
Dungeon Skills
Arcane Light Brightly illuminates the area. While in the magical light, Stealthed creatures will be revealed and the party will begin combat with a Damage Shield.
Glyph of Frost Places a trap in the dungeon. If an enemy passes over it, their movement will be slowed and they will be Chilled in combat.
Combat Abilities
Burst Eldritch Summons, Mana Surge, Time Warp
Character Trailer

Red Monika
Nickname The Outlaw
Passive Skills +10% base Evade Chance. Gains the Counter! buff when evading, which enhances Critical Chance by 5% for the next attack.
Dungeon Skills
Stealth Reduces the range at which enemies will detect the party, but movement speed will be slowed.
Pick Pocket Steals gold and items from creatures in front of Red Monika. Will not break Stealth.
Combat Abilities
Burst Creeping Death, Assassinate, Love Bomb
